articles.description: While the coronavirus restrictions have no doubt put pressure on some relationships, with people stuck in isolation together, one couple who aren’t feeling the strain is Jackie O’s ex-husband Lee Henderson and his new girlfriend Gabriella ‘Gabi’ Motta.
articles.content:
Jackie's ex-husband Lee has found love once more.
While the fiercely private couple havent shared any details surrounding their engagement, friends say it would have been a simple low-key affair.
Theyre really laid-back people; they wouldnt have made a fuss… [+2655 chars]

articles.title: Little Richard lit the path for generations of stars, but was an icon in his own right - ABC News
articles.description: Little Richard was a gamechanger, a true revolutionary whose style, flair and musical brilliance helped create rock and roll and inspire countless legends of the genre.
articles.content:
There is a moment in the documentary Hail! Hail! Rock 'n' Roll when Little Richard, Bo Diddley and Chuck Berry get together talking about the Chuck's run-ins with authority.
With his trademark lack of inhibition Little Richard asks Berry why he thought he'd … [+6241 chars]

articles.description: Gloriously profane, Miriam Margolyes is a force of nature and thoroughly loveable for it. She generates a magnetic field attracting all in her orbit.

articles.title: New Tiger King documentary ‘What Really Went Down?’ released - PerthNow
articles.description: The cult hit about Joe Exotic left audiences panting for more. Now, it has arrived.
articles.content:
If there has been one unexpected quirk of the 2020 pandemic lockdown, it would have to be the unlikely celebrity rise of a gun-slinging, mullet sporting, tiger breeding, gay, polygamist, redneck from the depths of the US.
